item.description:
Come sail with us on an evening cruise aboard the Tupelo Honey, a Friendship Sloop here in Boston Harbor. Enjoy cheese and crackers and a wine of your choice while taking in the harbor. BYOB or make requests with Captain Don and The Wine Bottega in the North End.

$25 per person includes a two hour cruise in the harbor, cheese, and crackers. BYOB or request a wine in advance. Sign up in advance at www.comesailawaynow.com and mention Nick or Meetup.com. Limit 12.

Boat leaves out of the marina next to Tavern on the Water in Charlestown, MA. Street and garage parking available, along with a 10-15 min walk from North Station or a 3-5 minute walk after taking the harbor ferry from Long Wharf.
item.name: Wine Tasting and Evening Sail aboard the Tupelo Honey
